sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3, 4} and B = {}. Determine whether B is a subset of A or not. Show all the steps of the solution.
message_2:
To determine whether B is a subset of A, we need to check if every element in B is also an element in A. 

Step 1: Identify the elements in set A and set B.
A = {1, 2, 3, 4}
B = {}

Step 2: Check if every element in B is also in A.
Since set B is an empty set, it has no elements. By definition, an empty set is a subset of any set, including set A.

Therefore, B is a subset of A.
